name: Web1 Student Project
tagline: Basic Multi-page Website for University Course
description: University assignment for Web Development course (Web1 - HCMUS). Built a multi-page website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript with features like login, search, blog comments, and contact form.

responsibilities: Built website interface with HTML and Bootstrap 5
Wrote JavaScript to handle login and API calls
Designed responsive layout with CSS and Bootstrap

features: Website with 5 main pages (Home, About, Blog, Gallery, Contact)
Contact form that can send emails

metrics: Responsive website works well on all devices
highlights: Got good grades for Web Development course
Gained proficiency in JavaScript and DOM manipulation
